LanguageData.RK_StrawberryBeer.label: Strawberry Beer
LanguageData.RK_StrawberryBeer.description: A special liquor traditionally made by Ratkins. Ratkins don't naturally have a high alcohol tolerance, so the alcohol concentration is quite low. It frequently makes an appearance at Ratkin celebrations.
LanguageData.RK_StrawberryBeer.tools.bottle.label: bottle
